attributes.action: Maria Miller must resign or be sacked
attributes.additional_details:
We want Maria Miller to resign or David Cameron to remove her from office.

Swindling us taxpayers was bad enough, but her attempts to prevent an investigation make the matter worse, especially as she is such a senior MP who should be setting an example to others.  Her reduced repayment of only £5,800 of the money she scammed from the British taxpayers is an insult.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter and not for Government
